tweet: Thanks to all of the first responders who battled the strip mall fire in Penn Hills on Sunday.  Spoke to Penn Hills No.7 VFC Chief today, glad to hear the injured firefighters are all on the mend. #PA17

Today we celebrate the 29th anniversary of the landmark bipartisan civil rights legislation Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). We’ve come a long way but have a lot more work ahead to ensure a more inclusive and accessible country. #PA17

If you have an issue with a federal agency such as @IRSNews or @SocialSecurity, my staff can assist. A member of my team will be at @northlandlib (300 Cumberland Road, Pittsburgh 15237) tomorrow for mobile office hours from 10a-3p for more information.  https://tinyurl.com/yythmpvs
No one likes robocalls. That’s why I voted for the “Stopping Bad Robocalls Act”.   Tell the Senate to stop phoning it in and pass this bill!  #PA17 pic.twitter.com/JTSAhhLgUv

Glad to hear that the @PAAttorneyGen officer shot yesterday in Ross Twp is in stable condition & wish him a full & speedy recovery. Still gathering details but want to thank all the law enforcement officers who go to work everyday ready to risk their lives to protect us.
